title: VFX Artists Recreate Groundbreaking Disney Special Effect Lost For 58 Years | Flipboard
text: VFX Artists Recreate Groundbreaking Disney Special Effect Lost For 58 Years VFX artists recreate a groundbreaking Disney visual effects technique that had been thought lost for almost six decades. In 1963, Walt Disney produced … [Stephen Yang, Ph.D.](/@exergamelab) flipped this story into [Photo NFT Gold](/@exergamelab/photo-nft-gold-0anr92rqz)•1d Related storyboards Related articles [This stunning photography book was shot with Sony compact cameras!](/@nndflip/depth-of-field-htkfqrptz/this-stunning-photography-book-was-shot-with-sony-compact-cameras/a-OXsqMQb3T5u6-uJWcAoLCg%3Aa%3A47977518-d609f9475b%2Fdigitalcameraworld.com) Mikko Takkunen teaches us that small equipment doesn't mean small output, as his new photography book Hong Kong was shot entirely on digital compact … [iPhone Camera App Pearla Aims to Make Phone Photos Less 'Phone-y'](/@nndflip/depth-of-field-htkfqrptz/iphone-camera-app-pearla-aims-to-make-phone-photos-less-phone-y/a-KPL-3EFSTDidHMMHE0PPOA%3Aa%3A47977518-0482c3e037%2Fpetapixel.com) iPhone cameras have come a long way, but a more hands-on app like Pearla can help mobile photographers more reliably incredible photos. The 2024 BAFTA Games Awards have come and gone … [Baldur's Gate 4 Isn't Next For Larian; Something Bigger Is Coming](/topic/specialeffects/baldur-s-gate-4-isn-t-next-for-larian-something-bigger-is-coming/a-Y2Ep2IdHRO6sIkrbuWIaYQ%3Aa%3A878901126-19c1a83117%2Fgamespot.com) Larian adds even more awards to its trophy case.
